EmailTemplate.description: Template to thank new users for signing up.
EmailTemplate.name: Succesful registration users
EmailTemplate.subject: Succesful registration!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there!
Thank you for creating your Spotiforce account. You're all ready to go!
Spotiforce makes it easy for any music-lover to connect with other people and explore new artists and themes. With Spotiforce, you can easily find new loves aswell as rediscover old favourites. All in one platform. For more information about Spotiforce please go refer to LINK
Thanks!
Spotiforce Support Team.
